ctk::ScopedLock

ctk::ScopedLock< L > Class Template Reference

#include <Mutex.hpp>


Public Member Functions

 ScopedLock (L &mutex)

Detailed Description

template<typename L>
class ctk::ScopedLock< L >

Simple version of scoped lock 
 Usage:

 Mutex mutex;
 {
     ScopedMutexLock lock(mutex);
     // critical code
 }
